tactic: induction alpha as [alpha IHalpha|alpha IHalpha|]; intro beta; try destruct beta as [beta|beta|].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: induction alpha as [alpha IHalpha|alpha IHalpha|]; intro beta; try destruct beta as [beta|beta|]. apply (OrdTrans IHalpha). apply ord_succ_le; auto. apply ord_le_succ_succ; auto. apply ord_le_succ_succ; auto. apply ord_le_succ_succ; auto.
